comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: That's only about half of the Blue Mountains.  It starts at Lawson.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/mich2009] This map titled "The Blue Mountains from Lawson to Lithgow" starts at Lawson on the right and ends at Lithgow.

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: A high-speed walker could walk from Litjhgow to Lawson in two day,  it took me three.
